===Etymology===
{{zh-compound|*拍|*拖|to cable, to wire|to drag}}. Originally {{etyl|yue|cmn}} from the {{w|Pearl River Delta}} region, meaning "hitched together" (of row-boat attached to motor-boat).

Also possibly a phonetic borrowing from English {{m|en|park}} + {{m|en|talk}}.
